# Republican People's Party Youth

| logo           =
| president      = Cem Aydın
| founded        =
| ideology       = KemalismSocial democracyProgressivismPro-Europeanism
| position       = Center-left
| headquarters   = Ankara, Turkey
| mother party   = Republican People's Party
| international  = International Union of Socialist Youth
| regional1_type = European
| regional1_name = Young European Socialists
| national       =
| website        = [http://www.chpgenclikkollari.org.tr/ chpgenclikkollari.org.tr]
}}
'''Republican People's Party Youth (also known as CHP Youth''') () is the youth organization of the Republican People's Party in Turkey. The organization has been a member of International Union of Socialist Youth since 2012 and Young European Socialists since 2011.
They hosted the YES Summer Camp 2013 in Foça, İzmir.
